text: 480 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS Land uses, activities, and delivery z Development should consist of a mixed-use, residential-led scheme with a mix of workspace and community uses, including provision of a primary and secondary school. z Acceptable land uses include: – Residential (Class C3) – Small scale retail/town centre uses (Class E) – Community uses (Class F1/F2) z Required on-site infrastructure includes: – Primary school – Reprovision and expansion of existing alternative secondary school z The site is in multiple ownership, and landowners and developers should work together to develop a comprehensive design-led masterplan for redevelopment of this site, to ensure development is delivered sustainably. Effective engagement between landowners, developers and leaseholders will be needed to facilitate potential land assembly and comprehensive redevelopment. Form, massing, and heritage
